data.title: VIDEO: At home with Deadmau5
data.meta_description: The world-renowned Canadian techno artist, who's giving a sold-out show in Toronto on Nov. 5, talks to CBC News about fame, music and his trademark mouse mask.
data.text:
He might not be a household name like Black Eyed Peas or Coldplay, but Toronto-based musician Joel Zimmerman has a worldwide reputation. As Deadmau5 (pronounced "dead mouse"), Zimmerman records brash dance music, and commands $100,000 US per show. He has over 2.5 million Facebook friends. In the realm of techno, he's the closest thing there is to a superstar.

Deadmau5 is scheduled to play a sold-out show in Toronto on Nov. 5.
